short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple color picker , you can use it to pick color from any web page or local files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CLL Color Picker is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of color selection from any web page or local file. With a single click, CLL Color Picker seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser, providing an intuitive tool for capturing and managing colors with ease.

Key Features:
Instant Color Capture: Quickly pick and capture colors from any element on your screen, whether it's a web page background, text, image, or other visual elements. CLL Color Picker ensures precise color accuracy in real time.

Versatile Color Formats: View captured colors in multiple formats including HEX, RGB, HSL, and CMYK. This flexibility supports various design and development needs, making it ideal for professionals and enthusiasts alike.

Personal Color Library: Save and organize your selected colors efficiently. CLL Color Picker allows you to store colors in a personal library, assign names or labels, and tag them for easy retrieval. This feature helps you keep track of your favorite colors and reuse them across different projects.

Seamless Integration: Designed to work seamlessly within the Chrome browser, CLL Color Picker is a perfect companion for web designers, developers, and anyone interested in color aesthetics. Its integration into the browser ensures that you can access the tool effortlessly whenever needed.

Privacy and Security: CLL Color Picker prioritizes your privacy by operating locally on your device. The extension captures colors within the browser environment without accessing or transmitting any sensitive information, ensuring a secure experience.

CLL Color Picker is your go-to solution for exploring and managing colors directly from your browser. Whether you're working on web design, graphic design, or simply experimenting with colors, this extension offers a comprehensive set of features to enhance your workflow. Discover accurate color scanning, versatile format support, and efficient color organization with CLL Color Picker, the ultimate tool for color enthusiasts.
